Recipe.title: Twisties
Recipe.yields: Depends upon how much Dough you make. &smiley;
Recipe.Description:
When ever you make Dutch Father's Pizza, make sure you make extra Crust dough.
A lot so you can make these for dessert afterwards!

section.instruction: Make Crust dough from Dutch Father's Pizza.
Roll dough into 2&foot; long &by; ½&inch; diameter "snakes".
Wrap around a smooth, 1&inch; diameter stick.
Cook over a campfire, like you would a marshmallow, only slower, until golden brown.

Slide off stick, and drizzle something sweet down the middle:
Jam
Honey
Chocolate Syrup
Honey Butter
etc.

Recipe.FinalNote: Sometimes, one per person is nowhere near enough. &smiley;
